projects.title: Tea Picker V1
projects.description: For my tech role application, I created a "Tea Roulette" app that randomly selects the next team member responsible for the office tea round. Despite being new to JavaScript, I built an interactive interface that features all the names of people in an office, and selects a chosen one at random upon clicking the button.

projects.title: Tea Picker V2
projects.description: Building on my initial Tea Roulette app, I enhanced user control by adding dynamic participant management. The upgraded version allows users to create custom tea-maker lists, add new volunteers, and remove those opting out. These improvements transformed a simple randomizer into a flexible, user-friendly office tool.

projects.title: Online CV
projects.description: I crafted a responsive digital CV utilizing Bootstrap and SCSS, leveraging advanced styling capabilities through nested rules and variables. By combining Bootstrap's component library with custom SCSS modules, I created a polished, mobile-friendly portfolio that demonstrates my growing expertise in modern front-end development.
